com.serfshack.jobwrangler.core

Interface JobObserver.Callback<S extends Job>

  • Enclosing class:
    JobObserver<T>

    public static interface JobObserver.Callback<S extends Job>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUpdate(S job, int key)
      Callback interface for the JobObserver.

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdate

        void onUpdate(S job,
              int key)
        Callback interface for the JobObserver. This is called whenever Job.notifyUpdate() is called. The default behavior is to tickle this callback when the job state changes. If no executor has been specified, a default SingleThreadExecutor will be used. The default executor is shared among all job observers.
        Parameters:
        job - The job on which notifyUpdate() was called
        key - The key passed to notifyUpdate(). This can be used to differentiate types of notification. NOTIFY_KEY_STATE_CHANGE (0) is reserved.
